body:
MaybeReduceResult MaglevGraphBuilder::TryBuildLoadNamedProperty(
    ValueNode* receiver, ValueNode* lookup_start_object, compiler::NameRef name,
    compiler::FeedbackSource& feedback_source,
    GenericAccessFunc&& build_generic_access) { ... }

Handles LoadNamedProperty lowering: requests broker()->GetFeedbackForPropertyAccess(...), checks for NamedAccess feedback, and dispatches to TryBuildNamedAccess or emits generic LoadNamedGeneric. Important anchor for where feedback is read and used to emit BuildCheckMaps and lowering into LoadFloat64+LoadTaggedField or LoadTaggedFieldForProperty.
explanation: Entry for named property load lowering in maglev-graph-builder.cc. This node path handles the monomorphic/polymorphic/megamorphic cases and is where broker GetFeedbackForPropertyAccess is interrogated before building CheckMaps and field loads.
